Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires any public authority that provides bus transportation in the county of Queens to perform a security audit on all of its bus routes
Summary: Requires any public authority that provides bus transportation in the county of Queens to perform a security audit on all of its bus routes.
LawCode: Add ยง2933, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to public authority accountability and security
